record.title: A hybrid machine learning framework by incorporating categorical boosting and manifold learning for financial analysis
record.subjects: Financial analysis ; Feature selection ; Manifold learning ; Machine learning ; Categorical boosting
record.abstract: Highlights •Developed a hybrid machine learning framework for financial analysis.•Characterized the financial behavior and mechanism using CatBoost.•Extract critical financial feature using manifold learning for financial analysis.•Verified and illustrated the developed framework using the synthetic datasets.
